creator: ondra@dynawest.cz
text: Same as Bug 40728, only this is for Tomcat 6.

Bugs reported against one version, will be fixed in that version and all subsequent versions. There is no need to create multiple bugzilla entries.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 40728 ***
creator: markt@apache.org
ondra@dynawest.cz
text: Ah, I see. Sorry. This varies across Projects.
